definition.text: This indicator compares the buying volume vs the selling volume to show what the prevailing trend is.

paragraphs.text: In addition to the degree of faith in the market, a "hull moving average agreement" is calculated and displayed as the backgroud colour. This provides futher confluence to the trend direction.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| FaithIndex | faith | value, hullAg |
The parameters for the indicator's calculations can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "Faith Index" Procedure Loop.
